name: Offdrive
description:
Offdrive is a short and minimalist, yet challenging driving game that pays heavy tribute to Namco's RALLY-X. Navigate through randomly generated terrain to avoid landmines while collecting the Yellow Flags that appear. Do your best to ensure that you have what it takes to stay alive!
